Feed yeast 2.0

Pando Nutrition is using cutting edge biotechnology to engineer new strains of feed yeast for livestock that improve feed efficiency and animal performance.

Learn more

Functional

Functional proteins improve feed efficiency.

Prebiotic

Prebiotics support gut flora and aid digestion.

Nutritional

Essential nutrients promote health and growth.

Functional. Bio-identical Proteins.

Proteins that improve digestion and nutrient uptake increase feed efficiency. Our proprietary platform will allow us to create bio-identical proteins that serve the function that nature intended.

Prebiotic. Microbiome support.

Prebiotics promote health and development. Our technology can replicate prebiotic proteins naturally found in various foods.

Nutritional. Balanced Amino Acids.

Quality nutrition stimulates growth and bolsters the immune system. By leveraging yeast's versatility, we will be able to provide hard to find nutrients such as essential amino acids, vitamins and minerals.

Customizable. Just Ask.

If you are seeking specific proteins, features or functionality, just ask! Our platform is flexible enough to accommodate new proteins, nutrients and more.
